name: 360BayArea
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: 360BayArea amplifies influencers and change makers in San Francisco, Oakland, San Jose and beyond. We dive into local headlines, trending hashtags, and colorful voices from all around the Bay!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
